comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: sheenshane on August 13, 2023, 09:52:02 PMHere in the forum, it has a negative review.Bitify Escrow is Scam | bitify.combitify.com Be careful with EscrowYou must understand the risk of dealing without escrow, so be careful every time dealing online, it should be peer to peer transaction.I followed both threads and both seem to be resolved.I searched several sources about bitify.com It has a good record and some users are skeptical about the slow response of the support team, but most of the sellers there are scammers, so you will most likely waste your money dealing with scam members and demanding a refund, so deal only with very high trust accounts or avoid using the service.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I used bitify.com several times between 2017 to 2020 to buy gift cards for Google Play, the purchases were successful in most cases, and I was deceived once (I was able to recover the money through escrow) and the company is registered in Australia and the support team responds well, but it Too slow. I have not used them since 2020, and many changes may occur, so search for any changes that occurred from 2020.
